title: The Constance Langdon/Witch Connection Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Hopefully Jessica Lange,frances Conroy and taissa farmiga all return

I was wondering how they could pull off a crossover and you solved it Mary! Using the house as a Power hotspot or tracking down the ghost-human cross breed To join the coven are fun ideas. I’m pumped for this season!

I have a feeling this season will have tons of flashbacks especially really far back in time maybe even breaking a record in ahs history only because i feel ryan will want to explain further of how and when they got there witchcraft powers

I doubt Constance is a witch because if she was she would have used witchcraft to get everything she wanted in life. But it does not mean she doesn't have the genetic heredity, meaning the genetic affliction could've skip Constance's generation.
